game.name: Mahjong Pyramids
game.description:
No need to get you bored with the old style matching game when you a brand new solitaire style puzzle challenge to explore during your free time! You have to match ancient pyramid mahjong tiles to finish all levels in Mahjong Pyramids. There are multiple obstacles to prevent you from complete the levels on time. So try to be little fast before the time runs out. Get a chance to train your brain and improve your logical skills in this fun and challenging platform!
It is easy to start this simple and addictive gameplay but very difficult to become a master of it. Complete each level to earn some points and grab the power ups to reward you at the end! This cool html5 arcade challenge includes Egyptian/pyramid theme equipped with mahjong matching elements. Keep solving every pyramid puzzle timely to become a champion of this mobile matching game! There are more than 12 interesting and engaging levels to play online. Try to beat each level as fast as you can and put every possible effort to do it all over again with an even faster time!
You should definitely try out this pyramid style online game if you enjoy memory, strategy, puzzle and brain training challenges. Apply logic and strategy to match pairs of identical Mahjong tiles to clear the screen from all the mahjongs! The rules of this innovative puzzle challenge are very simple and addictive. There will be no time limit to have fun. Many exciting challenges are waiting for you in this magical mahjong pyramid solitaire game. Enjoy more than 800 Mahjong free boards, 4+ backgrounds as well as achievements and leaderboards!
